title: Issue with phone switching off. Constantly on 50% but doesn't work unless plugged in.
content: Phone randomly switched off last night and wouldn't switch back on. Managed to switch phone on 12 hours later by pressing on phone.battery logo came up with a question mark and stays stuck at to percent. Ran a diagnostic and it says the battery is not connected.i have factory reset the phone and tried differently chargers but 2 minutes after I disconnect my phone from the charger it switches off and doesn't switch back on without a lot of work. My phone turns 1 year old next week. Google don't seem to have a chat option available and I really need my phone. does anyone know how google are dealing with this as a lot of people have the same issue.
